metadata.title: CVE-2016-6610 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: A full path disclosure vulnerability was discovered in phpMyAdmin where auser can trigger a particular error in the export mechanism to discover thefull path of phpMyAdmin on the disk. All 4.6.x versions (prior to 4.6.4),4.4.x versions (prior to 4.4.15.8), and 4.0.x versions (prior to 4.0.10.17)are affected.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
